parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To begin. Middle voice of archo; to commence.
To beat, strike, wound, inflict punishment.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From sun and doulos; a co-slave, i.e. Servitor or ministrant of the same master.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To be intoxicated with wine, be drunk. From another form of methe; to drink to intoxication, i.e. Get drunk.
